title: Ray Charles and Betty Carter - Dedicated To You (1961) RESEED
description:
Ray Charles And Betty Carter, originally released in July 1961, is the Genius? timeless album of duets with the jazz singer?s jazz singer, who sang with the likes of Bird, Miles, and Diz throughout her respected career. Dedicated To You, originally released in January 1961, collect?s Ray?s musical love notes to 12 very special women ? by name! These two outstanding, long-out-of-print albums on a single CD are just eagerly awaiting to complete your music collection. 

Recorded August 18 - 30, 1960, New York City, New York, USA
